revised_title: Basal Metabolism Measurement Techniques in Mental Hospital Patients
tldr: The authors developed a chamber to measure the basal metabolism of mental hospital patients by determining the respiratory exchange. They constructed a specialized chamber with a modified Haldane air analysis apparatus to measure the changes in the air and eliminate disturbing factors. The research aimed to add to the understanding of disorders in the endocrine organs and the central and sympathetic nervous system.
